StartDateLocal.description: The booking starting time and date, in the booking location’s local time.

EndDateLocal.description: The booking ending time and date, in the booking location’s local time.

Registration.description: License plate of the rental car

ClassReserved.description: Character code to indicate the class of the car reserved. Varies by vendor. Supported values: C - Compact, E - Economy, F - Full size, I - Intermediate, L - Luxury, M - Mini, P - Premium, S - Standard, X - Special

ClassRented.description: Character code to indicate the class of the car rented. Varies by vendor. Supported values: C - Compact, E - Economy, F - Full size, I - Intermediate, L - Luxury, M - Mini, P - Premium, S - Standard, X - Special

ClassCharged.description: Character code to indicate the class of the car charged. Varies by vendor. Supported values: C - Compact, E - Economy, F - Full size, I - Intermediate, L - Luxury, M - Mini, P - Premium, S - Standard, X - Special

Transmission.description: The character code that indicates if the car has auto-transmission. Supported values: A - Auto, M - Manual

AC.description: The character code that indicates if car has air conditioner. Supported values: R - AC, N - No AC

FuelType.description: Type of fuel required for the rental vehicle

OdometerIn.description: Odometer reading on the rental car when it is returned to the vendor

OdometerOut.description: Odometer readong on the rental car when it departs the vendor

TotalTaxableAmount.description: Total taxable amount of the amount paid for the car rental

TotalTaxAmount.description: Amount of tax paid on the car rental

AverageDailyRate.description: The average daily rate for the booking.

CorporateDiscountCode.description: Discount code or contract or similar, arraanged by employer

CorporateDiscountName.description: Discount code or contract or similar, arraanged by employer
